name: Behavioural theories overview
description:
Overview and comparison of major behavioural theories:

  1. Transtheoretical model
  2. Theory of planned behavior (based on the theory of reasoned action)
  3. MINDSPACE approach
  4. Fogg model
  5. Hook model (similar to the model of Charles Duhigg described in his book “The Power of Habit” and also to the engagement loop by Amy Jo Kim)
